preferences.name: defaultBibleVersion
preferences.title: Default Bible Version
preferences.description: The default bible version to use when searching. Defaults to "NLT".

commands.name: bibleSearch
commands.title: Bible Search
commands.description: Search for, display, copy and paste bible passages. Configure whether to include verse numbers or show one verse per line.

preferences.name: enterToSearch
preferences.label: Press Enter to search
preferences.description: Press Enter key to perform search, as opposed to searching while typing. Saves network calls.

preferences.name: includeVerseNumbers
preferences.label: Include verse numbers
preferences.description: Include individual verse numbers in the results.

preferences.name: includeReferences
preferences.label: Include references
preferences.description: Add passage references to the results.

preferences.name: oneVersePerLine
preferences.label: Show one verse per line
preferences.description: Display each verse on a separate line. Might separate verses into multiple lines, for ex. see Psalm 1 (ESV)

scripts.build: npm run update-bible-versions && ray build -e dist
